features.name: Authentication
features.description: User authentication system with sign in, sign up, and sign out functionality. Includes role-based access control (customer, vendor, admin).

features.name: Marketplace
features.description: Product browsing and discovery page with search, category filtering, and product listing functionality.

features.name: Product Details
features.description: Individual product detail page showing product information, reviews, and add to cart functionality.

features.name: Shopping Cart
features.description: Shopping cart management with add, update quantity, remove items, and vendor grouping functionality.

features.name: Checkout
features.description: Order checkout process with shipping address form, order creation, sub-order generation by vendor, and stock management.

features.name: Orders
features.description: Order history and management page showing customer orders with detailed sub-orders grouped by vendor.

features.name: Vendor Dashboard
features.description: Vendor management dashboard showing sales statistics, product management, and recent orders.

features.name: Admin Dashboard
features.description: Admin panel for platform management including vendor management, statistics, and platform insights.

features.name: Notifications
features.description: User notification system for order updates, payments, and other platform events.

features.name: Navigation
features.description: Main navigation component with role-based menu items and authentication state handling.

features.name: Type Definitions
features.description: TypeScript type definitions for all data models including User, Vendor, Product, Order, Cart, and Review.
